title: FS Trio of Cubs - Sov, AB, PB backs Evers, Kling & Kroh
author: Rascal1010

posts.post_title: FS Trio of Cubs - Sov, AB, PB backs Evers, Kling & Kroh
posts.post_content:
Looking to cut back some of my Cubs T206 collection and thought I would start things off with this trio.  I can be reached via email (asmusstephen@gmail.com) or via PM.  All prices are delivered.  Prices are net to me.

T206 Evers (Chicago) Polar Bear SGC 2 - $ 385 SOLD
T206 Kling Sovereign 150 PSA 4 - $ 695 SOLD
T206 Kroh American Beauty Frame SGC 3 - $ 545. SOLD
